response.overview: Film student Jennie stages an uncanny audition to cast an actress as her late friend, hoping to re-enact their final moments together. What begins as a search for closure evolves into a self-reflexive journey, unraveling layers of memory, identity, and grief. Blurring the line between fiction and reality, this bold experimental film becomes a haunting meditation on the impossibility of closure and the fluidity of self.
response.title: It's Oh So Quiet
